item.title: 汇丰银行与法国初创公司 Mistral 合作，加速生成式人工智能的推广
item.description: 汇丰银行周一表示，它已与法国初创公司 Mistral AI 签订了一项多年协议，将在全行范围内整合生成式人工智能工具，旨在加快自动化进程、提高生产率并加强客户服务。【原文：HSBC said on Monday it had signed a multi-year deal with French start-up Mistral AI to integrate generative artificial intelligence tools across the bank, aiming to speed up automation, lift productivity, and enhance client services.】

item.title: 印度命令智能手机制造商预装国有网络安全应用程序
item.description: 印度电信部私下要求智能手机制造商在所有新设备中预装一个不能删除的国有网络安全应用程序，政府命令显示，此举很可能与苹果公司和隐私权倡导者对立。【原文：India's telecoms ministry has privately asked smartphone makers to preload all new devices with a state-owned cyber security app that cannot be deleted, a government order showed, a move likely to antagonise Apple and privacy advocates.】

item.title: 早间竞价加息前景暂时抑制日元跌势
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 亚马逊和谷歌推出多云服务，实现更快连接
item.description: 亚马逊和谷歌在一份声明中说，亚马逊和谷歌周日推出了联合开发的多云网络服务，以满足人们对可靠连接日益增长的需求。【原文：Amazon and Google introduced a jointly developed multicloud networking service on Sunday to meet growing demand for reliable connectivity the companies said in a statement, at a time when even brief internet disruptions can cause major outages.】

item.title: 台湾寻求在美国贸易协议中将关税降至 15
item.description: 台湾高级官员周一表示，台湾的目标是将对美出口关税从目前的20%削减至15%，但帮助培训美国工人并不在双方贸易谈判中提出的 "条件 "之列。【原文：Taiwan is aiming for tariffs on its exports to the United States to be cut to 15% from 20% now, though help in training U.S. workers is not among the "conditions" figuring in their trade talks, senior Taiwan officials said on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司任命小马蒂森为新主席
item.description: 明星娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）选举小布鲁斯-马蒂森（Bruce Mathieson Jr.）为董事长，巩固了亿万富翁马蒂森家族对这家陷入困境的赌场公司的控制，此前该家族和美国博彩集团百利（Bally's）将其救援贷款转换为股权。【原文：Star Entertainment has elected Bruce Mathieson Jr. as chairman, cementing the billionaire Mathieson family’s grip on the embattled casino firm after the family and U.S. gaming group Bally’s converted their rescue loans into equity.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）运营商遭遇的最新故障
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）的公告平台周一遭遇故障，这是这家证券交易所运营商遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：The Australian Securities Exchange (ASX) was hit by an outage to its announcements platform on Monday, the latest setback for the stock exchange operator that is already under scrutiny from regulators over its governance and ability to deliver market infrastructure.】

item.title: 美国贸易协议未能重振需求，亚洲工厂步履蹒跚
item.description: 在世界最大的生产国中国，工厂活动再次陷入萎缩。日本、韩国和台湾的工厂活动也有所下降。【原文：In China, the world's largest manufacturer, factory activity slipped back into contraction. Japan, South Korea and Taiwan also reported declines in activity.】

item.title: 调查显示，中国 11 月新房价格攀升，但转售价值跌幅扩大
item.description: 周一公布的一项民间调查显示，11月份中国新房价格上涨速度加快，但二手房市场价格进一步下跌，这表明受危机影响的房地产行业尚未触底反弹。【原文：China's new home prices rose at a faster pace in November, but prices in the secondary market declined further in a sign that the crisis-hit property sector has yet to bottom out, according to a private survey released on Monday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市震荡；上田言论提振加息希望，日元走强
item.description: 在11月强劲收尾之后，周一股市转跌，原因是风险厌恶情绪笼罩市场，即使美国降息的乐观情绪依然未变，而日元走强，投资者正在权衡最快本月加息的前景。 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）在名古屋发表演讲时，日元走强至1美元兑155.47日元，成为货币市场的焦点，投资者正在寻找下一次加息时机的线索。 上田在对商界领袖发表讲话时说，央行将在下一次政策会议上考虑加息的 "利弊"，就本月晚些时候是否加息发出了迄今为止最强烈的信号。上田将在当天晚些时候再次发表讲话。【原文：Stocks turned lower on Monday after a strong end to November as a bout of risk aversion gripped markets even as U.S. rate-cut optimism remained intact while the yen firmed, with investors weighing the prospect of a rate hike as soon as this month. The spotlight in the currency market has been on the Japanese yen , which strengthened to 155.47 per U.S. dollar as Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda took the stage in Nagoya with investors looking for cues on the timing of the next hike. Ueda said in a speech to business leaders that the central bank would consider the "pros and cons" of raising rates at its next policy meeting, providing the strongest signal yet on whether a hike was on the cards later this month. Ueda is due to speak again later in the day.】

item.title: 美国牛肉产量下降，澳大利亚扩大谷饲牛肉出口
item.description: 六千头黑安格斯牛咀嚼着大麦、青贮饲料、棉籽和糖蜜，在澳大利亚炙热的阳光下，在三排阴凉的牛栏里膘肥体壮。【原文：Six thousand Black Angus cattle chew on rolled barley, silage, cottonseed and molasses, fattening up in three rows of shaded pens under the hot Australian sun.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，贡渥集团正在考虑推动美国能源发展，以加强与华盛顿的关系
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，大宗商品贸易商贡渥集团（Gunvor）已就投资美国石油和天然气生产资产进行了积极的谈判，这可能会在贡渥集团竞购受制裁的俄罗斯大型卢克石油公司（Lukoil）海外资产的风波之后缓和与特朗普政府的关系。【原文：Commodity trader Gunvor has held active talks to invest in U.S. oil- and gas-producing assets, which could smooth over ties with the Trump administration after fallout from Gunvor's bid to buy sanctioned Russian major Lukoil's foreign assets, two sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 日元因上田言论而上涨；美元为关键的 12 月做好准备
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫发表讲话，为近期加息敞开大门，日元因此在周一上涨；而美元则在本月伊始走低，因为投资者加大了对美国本月降息的押注。【原文：The yen rose on Monday, helped by comments from Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda who left the door open to a near-term rate hike, while the dollar began the month on the back foot as investors ramped up bets of a U.S. rate cut this month.】

item.title: 芯片和汽车带动韩国 11 月出口超预期
item.description: 韩国 11 月份出口连续第六个月增长，超出市场预期，原因是芯片销售因强劲的技术需求而创下新高，而汽车也在美国达成贸易协议后大幅增长。【原文：South Korea's exports rose in November for a sixth consecutive month, beating market expectations, as chip sales hit a record on strong technology demand while autos also jumped after a U.S. trade deal.】

item.title: 空中客车缩小软件危机，航空公司度过A320召回难关
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士称，在上周末捷蓝航空飞机高度下降可能存在但未经证实的联系出现后不久，就做出了召回大约一半 A320 机队的史无前例的决定。【原文：Sources familiar with the matter said the unprecedented decision to recall about half the A320-family fleet, was taken shortly after the possible but unproven link to a drop in altitude on the JetBlue jet emerged late last week.】

item.title: 欧佩克+会议维持当前产量后石油上涨
item.description: 在欧佩克+周日会议重申明年第一季度暂停增产的计划后，油价周一上涨超过1.5%。【原文：Oil prices rose more than 1.5% on Monday after the OPEC+ meeting on Sunday reaffirmed its plan to pause production increases in the first quarter of next year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所网站显示，公司公告受到故障影响
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）官方网站周一显示，该交易所出现故障，影响了公司公告的发布。【原文：Australia's stock exchange operator ASX was experiencing an outage affecting the publication of corporate announcements, its official website showed on Monday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，数据中心运营商 CyrusOne 在故障后增加了更多冷却设备
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日援引 CyrusOne 的一份声明报道，数据中心运营商 CyrusOne 已在其位于伊利诺伊州的 Aurora 数据中心安装了额外的后备冷却能力，上周的一次故障引发了芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group）数小时的停机。【原文：Data center operator CyrusOne has installed additional backup cooling capacity at its Aurora, Illinois data center after a failure last week triggered an outage at CME Group for several hours, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday, citing a statement by CyrusOne.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国库酒业公司（Treasury Wine Estates）宣布美国资产减值
item.description: 澳大利亚 Treasury Wine Estates 公司周一表示，预计将对其在美国的资产进行非现金减值。【原文：Australia's Treasury Wine Estates said on Monday it expects to recognise a non-cash impairment of its U.S.-based assets.】

item.title: 德国报纸报道：德国电信与施瓦茨集团将共建人工智能数据中心
item.description: 据德国《商报》周日报道，德国电信和施瓦茨集团正计划联合建造一座人工智能千兆工厂。【原文：Deutsche Telekom and the Schwarz Group are planning to jointly build a gigafactory for artificial intelligence, German newspaper Handelsblatt reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Databricks 正在商谈以 1,340 亿美元的估值进行融资
item.description: 据 The Information 周日援引投资者文件和一位知情人士的话报道，数据分析公司 Databricks 正在洽谈融资 50 亿美元，估值为 1,340 亿美元，约为今年预期销售额约 41 亿美元的 32 倍。【原文：Data analytics firm Databricks is in talks to raise $5 billion at a valuation of $134 billion, which is roughly 32 times this year's expected sales of about $4.1 billion, The Information reported on Sunday, citing investor documents and a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，联合健康同意以 10 亿美元的价格将南美业务出售给私募股权公司 Patria
item.description: 两位知情人士周日透露，联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）已同意以 10 亿美元的价格将其在南美的最后一个业务 Banmedica 出售给巴西私募股权投资集团 Patria Investments。【原文：UnitedHealth Group has agreed to sell its last South American business Banmedica to Brazilian private equity group Patria Investments for $1 billion, two sources with knowledge of the matter said on Sunday.】

item.title: Cotality称，澳大利亚11月房价攀升，难以负担程度创历史新高
item.description: 房地产咨询公司 Cotality 周一表示，澳大利亚 11 月份房价上涨，其中几个州府的房价涨幅较大，而住房难以负担的程度却达到了创纪录的水平。【原文：Australian home prices rose in November with large gains in several state capitals, amid a record level of housing unaffordability, property consultant Cotality said on Monday.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金将在微软股东大会上投票支持人权报告，反对管理层
item.description: 挪威2万亿美元的财富基金周日表示，将在即将召开的微软年度股东大会上投票支持一项股东提案，该提案要求微软提交一份报告，说明在人权问题严重的国家开展业务的风险。【原文：Norway's $2 trillion wealth fund said on Sunday it would vote for a shareholder proposal at the upcoming Microsoft annual general meeting requiring for a report on the risks of operating in countries with significant human rights concerns.】

item.title: 美国法官批准向 Elliott 关联公司出售 Citgo 母公司股份
item.description: 本周早些时候，美国法官批准了埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）在一场由法院组织的拍卖会上提出的 59 亿美元的出价，用于支付与委内瑞拉有关联的债权人，此后，一名美国法官于周六授权将 Citgo 石油公司委内瑞拉母公司的股份出售给埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的一家附属公司。【原文：A U.S. judge on Saturday authorized the sale of shares in the Venezuela-owned parent of Citgo Petroleum to an affiliate of Elliott Investment Management, following his approval earlier this week of a $5.9 billion bid from the company in a court-organized auction to pay Venezuela-linked creditors.】

item.title: 韩国电子商务公司Coupang称3370万客户账户遭入侵
item.description: 该公司表示，被暴露的数据不包括支付详情或登录凭证。【原文：Exposed data does not include payment details or login credentials, the firm said.】

item.title: 消息人士称欧佩克+将维持石油产出政策稳定
item.description: 欧佩克+"四位消息人士称，"欧佩克+"可能在周日的会议上维持石油产量水平不变，因为该组织在担心供应过剩迫在眉睫的情况下放慢了夺回市场份额的步伐。【原文：OPEC+ will likely leave oil output levels unchanged at its meetings on Sunday, four OPEC+ sources said as the group slows down its push to regain market share amid fears of a looming supply glut.】

item.title: Adobe 报告称，美国 "黑色星期五 "在线销售额达到创纪录的 118 亿美元
item.description: Adobe Analytics 的最终数据显示，美国购物者在 "黑色星期五 "的网上消费额达到创纪录的 118 亿美元，比去年增长 9.1%。【原文：American shoppers spent a record $11.8 billion online on Black Friday, up 9.1% from last year, final data from Adobe Analytics showed.】

item.title: 中国央行誓言打击虚拟货币，对稳定币表示担忧
item.description: 中国央行周六重申了其对虚拟货币的强硬立场，警告投机活动将卷土重来，并誓言打击涉及稳定币的非法活动。【原文：China's central bank reaffirmed its tough stance on virtual currencies on Saturday, warning of a resurgence in speculation and vowing to crack down on illegal activities involving stablecoins.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空客放宽了对 A320 召回影响的估计
item.description: 据业内消息人士周六透露，空中客车公司正告知航空公司，对受重大召回影响的部分A320喷气机进行紧急维修的负担可能没有最初想象的那么重。【原文：Airbus is telling airlines that emergency repairs to some of the A320 jets affected by a major recall may be less burdensome than first thought, industry sources said on Saturday.】
